The Department of National Defense (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake, 1 Air Maintenance Squadron (1 AMS) Machine Shop requires the supply and delivery of one (1) M-40 Universal Cutter and tool grinder (and accessories) for the purpose of manufacturing custom sized reamers that are necessary for themaintenance of the CF18 fleet.
tags: M-40 Universal Cutter and tool grinder
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to submit bids for the supply and delivery of a M-40 Universal Cutter and tool grinder for the Department of National Defence (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake.

#### Tender Overview

* Bid Reference Number: WS4339915327
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4339915327
* Publication Date: December 8, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: March 12, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: February 28, 2024
* Regions of Delivery: Cold Lake, AB
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### Supply Requirements

The requester, 1 Air Maintenance Squadron (1 AMS) of the 4 Wing Cold Lake, requires the supply and delivery of one (1) M-40 Universal Cutter and tool grinder (including accessories) for the purpose of manufacturing custom sized reamers necessary for the maintenance of the CF18 fleet.

#### Bid Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not provided

#### Attachments

None

#### Public Tender Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18232082?extsite=MTgyMzIwODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This tender announcement is invalid, and the closing time has been extended. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 18, 2024, at 1400 EST. Any bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  I (you) included no information that would suggest the closing date has been extended. As a responsible editor, I have adhered to the same information structure and phrasing used in the original text.

*Disclaimer: Note
